articles.title: Foreign Ministry on UN Presidential Statement of on "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry on UN Presidential Statement of on "Cheonan"
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Saturday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the issue of the presidential statement of the United Nations Security Council on the "Cheonan" case:
					 The south Korean authorities brought up the case for discussion at the UNSC, but it concluded the discussion on this issue by issuing its presidential statement devoid of any proper judgment and conclusion without adopting any resolution on it. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the UNSC took heed of the reactions of the countries concerned including the DPRK which clarified that it had nothing to do with the case. 
					
					 The discussion could not have ended up otherwise as the UNSC hastily tabled and handled the case before the truth of the case has been probed.
					
					 This clearly proves what a foolish calculation the U.S. and south Korea made when they were recklessly behaving in so great haste to do harm to the DPRK for no reason.
					
					 We take note of the presidential statement saying that "the Security Council encourages the settlement of outstanding issues on the Korean Peninsula by peaceful means to resume direct dialogue and negotiation through appropriate channels."
					
					 The "Cheonan" case should have been settled between the north and the south without referring it to the UN.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to probe the truth about the case to the last. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should strictly preserve the scene of the incident including the state of seabed as they were till the inspection team of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK reaches there. 
					
					 The recent development in which the overall situation on the Korean Peninsula reached a point of explosion in a moment due to a conspiratorial farce once again reminds us of the danger of the present cease-fire and the urgency to establish a peace-keeping regime. 
					
					 The DPRK will make consistent efforts for the conclusion of a peace treaty and the denuclearization through the six-party talks conducted on equal footing. 
					
					 If the hostile forces persist in such provocations as demonstration of forces and sanctions in contravention of the presidential statement which calls for "avoiding conflicts and averting escalation" on the Korean Peninsula,  they will neither be able to escape the DPRK's strong physical retaliation nor will be able to evade the responsibility for the resultant escalation of the conflict.

articles.title: DPRK UN Representative Holds Press Conference
articles.content:
DPRK UN Representative Holds Press Conference
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Sin Son Ho, permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN, held a press conference in New York on Friday as regards the issue of the presidential statement of the United Nations Security Council on the "Cheonan" case.
					 The press conference was attended by correspondents of various countries at the UN.
					
					 Sin Son Ho said that the UNSC could not make any proper judgment or conclusion as it hastily tabled and handled the case before the truth of the case has been probed.
					
					 The "Cheonan" case should have been settled between the north and the south without referring it to the UN, he said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK will probe the truth behind the case to the last.
					
					The recent development in which the situation on the Korean Peninsula reached a point of explosion in a moment due to a conspiratorial farce once again reminds us of the danger of the present cease-fire and the urgency to establish a peace-keeping regime.
					
					 The DPRK will make consistent efforts for the conclusion of a peace treaty and the denuclearization on the peninsula through the six-party talks conducted on equal footing. 
					
					 Answering the questions raised by reporters, Sin said that the presidential statement of the UNSC which said it took note of the DPRK's stand that it had nothing to do with the "Cheonan" case meant a diplomatic victory of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Mongolian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 89th anniversary of the Mongolian people's victory in the revolution.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations of excellent tradition between the DPRK and Mongolia would grow stronger.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Mongolian PM
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a message of greetings to Mongolian Prime Minister Sukhbaataryn Batbold on Saturday on the occasion of the 89th anniversary of the Mongolian people's victory in the revolution.
					 The message noted with pleasure that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations have positively developed in various fields including politics, economy and culture, wishing the prime minister and the Mongolian government bigger success in their efforts for the development of the country and the welfare of the people.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent similar message to Mongolian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Gombojab Zandanshatar on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Romania Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Romania Appointed
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Gyong was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Romania, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A function of laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung was held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on Thursday on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were Secretary-General Alfonso Fraga Perez and members of the organization, and Kwon Sung Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid the floral basket and made bows to the portrait.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Hyong Jik
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Ponghwa-ri, Kangdong County of Pyongyang, and his grave in Mangyongdae on Saturday on the occasion of the 116th anniversary of his birth.
					 Seen there were wreaths from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam and others and officials of the Party, armed forces, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the statue and grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, ministries, national institutions, scientific and educational institutions, military academies and party and power organs, enterprises, farms and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Hyong Jik, looking back on the brilliant revolutionary life and exploits performed by him.
					
					 On the same day wreaths and flowers were laid before his statues at Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University and in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province and Junggang County, Jagang Province.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of O Jung Hup
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of O Jung Hup
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of revolutionary martyr O Jung Hup at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Saturday on the occasion of the centenary of his birth.
					 Seen before it was a wreath sent by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Yong Chun and O Kuk Ryol and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet and ministries, servicepersons, bereaved family members of O Jung Hup and officials and working people in the city.
					
					 Placed before the bust were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Oil Industry, the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK and the Pyongyang Clothing Industry Management Bureau and flowers were laid.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to O Jung Hup.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai hosted a reception at his embassy on Saturday on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Society and other officials concerned.
					
					 Liu Hongcai said at the reception that Premier Zhou Enlai and President Kim Il Sung signed the Sino-DPRK Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance 49 years ago, adding that this marked an event of weighty importance in the history of the bilateral relations. 
					
					 Noting that the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations have grown stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries in recent years, he stressed that it is the consistent policy of the party and the government of China to steadily boost these ties.   He sincerely hoped that the Korean people would register greater successes in the socialist construction this year marking the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Speaking next, Choe Chang Sik said that President Kim Il Sung together with Premier Zhou Enlai provided a firm legal foundation for developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in all fields.
					
					 He noted that the Chinese people have registered successes in building a harmonious socialist society based on scientific outlook on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship through generations to come, he said, stressing that the DPRK would strive to bring the flower garden of the DPRK-China friendship into fuller bloom in the future, too.
					
					 The consulate-general of the People's Republic of China in Chongjin, also gave a reception on July 9 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Staged in Beijing
articles.content:
Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Staged in Beijing
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the DPRK staged again opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" in Beijing from July 5 to 7 at the request of the Ministry of Culture of China and Beijingites. 
					 The state grand theatre was packed to its capacity with audiences every day. 
					
					 After watching the opera, a vice department director of the ministry had this to say: 
					
					 Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" is good in its script and flawless in its music and dances. 
					
					 Not a few countries are only seeking stage effect by use of modern technical means, failing to move audience. 
					
					 But Korean artistes are mesmerizing audience for their high skills and refined acting. 
					
					 I bow my head to the arts of the DPRK which produced the classical work of China as an opera. 
					
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe's visit to China has made a big contribution to further developing the friendly relations between the two countries and promoting the cultural exchange between them. 
					
					 The director of the theater said that the performance of the opera got away from the practice of the theater's programming, adding:
					
					 The theatre was so crowded with programs until the first half of next year that it was hard to let the Phibada Opera Troupe use the stage more but it allowed the troupe to give more performances as an exception. 
					
					 The performance of Korean style opera provided Chinese with an opportunity to learn better about the arts of the DPRK. 
					
					 It was adaptation in word but a creation in fact.

articles.title: Int'l Cooperation Strengthened in Population Work
articles.content:
Int'l Cooperation Strengthened in Population Work
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Twenty-five years has elapsed since the cooperation between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the United Nations Population Fund (UNPF) was started.
					 The DPRK government concluded an agreement with the UNPF in Juche 74 (1985) and has conducted various activities to improve the population work.
					
					 From 1986 the UNPF has cooperated with the DPRK in the population work such as training of experts, building of material foundations, census of population and improvement of the women's health.
					
					 In cooperation with the UNPF, the DPRK government conducted the first nationwide census in 1993 and the second in 2008 in a scientific way suitable to the international standard.
					
					 The government has also successfully finished the survey of the pregnant women's mortality and health, one of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG).
					
					 The results of the survey have served as basic data in working out national economic growth plan and public health plan in a scientific way.
					
					 On the occasion of the World Population Day (July 11), Yang Song Il, a section chief of the Population Centre of the DPRK, told KCNA that the 2007-2010 fourth cooperation plan between the UNPF and the DPRK will be finished and the 2011-2013 fifth cooperation plan will be worked out this year.
					
					 He said, "We will continue surveys in different fields to make a scientific contribution to the development of national economy and public health and work hard to implement the action programme of the International Conference on Population and Developmentand attain the MDG, further strengthening cooperation with international organizations, including the UNPF".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Theory of "Adhering to Principle" Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Theory of "Adhering to Principle" Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday runs its commentator's article denouncing the south Korean authorities' criminal theory of "adhering to the principle."
					 The theory of "adhering to the principle" much touted by the Lee Myung Bak group is very dangerous and traitorous sophism as it is bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and seeking confrontation and war in denial of the June 15 joint declaration, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet group was sternly judged by the people in the "elections to local self-governing bodies" for driving the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and failing in its domestic and foreign policies. It is, however, challenging the people by making a mockery of their mindset and public opinion, far from atoning for its wrong doings.
					
					 The Lee group's loudmouthed "adhering to the principle" is nothing but a clumsy excuse to cover up its crimes against the nation, democracy and reunification and justify its moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and launch a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The theory of "adhering to the principle" advocated by the puppet group is very nonsensical sophism and theory of confrontation against reunification in the light of its contents, essence and objective. 
					
					 What matters, above all, is the "principle" calling for subordinating the inter-Korean relations to the relations with the U.S.
					
					 This is an open denial of the national sovereignty and an extremely harmful sycophantic and traitorous idea devoid of an elementary view and standpoint on the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 In insisting on the "theory of giving priority to the south Korea-U.S. relations" the puppet group seeks, in the final analysis, to leave south Korea as a permanent colony of the U.S. and, furthermore, expand it to the northern half of Korea. 
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for the puppet group to assert that it would not promote the inter-Korean relations unless the nuclear issue of the north is settled and regard this as a "principle." 
					
					 The puppet group’s accusation against the DPRK over its nuclear issue is nothing but a ridiculous artifice to force it to dismantle its powerful nuclear deterrence at any cost and join the U.S. in more desperately pursuing the moves for a nuclear war against it.
					
					 The puppet conservative group's description of the inter-Korean relations which had steadily advanced since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration as "the lost decade" is an intolerable mockery and insult to the desire of the nation for reunification. 
					
					 The aim sought by the puppet group is to bring to naught the successes achieved between the north and the south after the publication of the June 15 declaration and push the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation in denial of the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 This group is now crying out for "adhering to the principle," terming the bedeviled inter-Korean relations "proper south-north relations" and the "south-north relations put on a normal track" even though it pushed them to a catastrophe. It is self-evident that such hooligans as the Lee Myung Bak group should not be allowed to go scot-free. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that by advocating the above-said theory they can get nothing but destruction.

articles.title: Actions for Implementation of Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Actions for Implementation of Joint Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement titled "Let us launch an all-out movement to implement the June 15 joint declaration and achieve peace against the U.S. and war by inheriting the spirit of the July 4 joint statement" on July 5.
					 The statement recalled that the nation marked the 38th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement which clarified the three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 The joint statement which clarified the fundamental stand and ways for national reunification brought the fellow countrymen hope for the reunification and it is fully displaying its vitality and validity thanks to the June 15 joint declaration, it said, adding:
					
					 The youth and students are now faced with the task to advance for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and peace against war under the uplifted slogan "Let us reunify the country by peaceful means by concerted efforts of the Koreans!" 
					
					 The statement chided the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" for escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula by frantically staging war exercises, beefing up armed forces and resuming the psychological warfare against the DPRK with the "Cheonan" case as a momentum. 
					
					 That day the organization also made public an appeal calling for turning out in actions against the moves of the puppet group to eliminate the progressive forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Campaign under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Personages of various organizations including the Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, when interviewed by internet broadcasting "Voice of People," denounced the repressive campaign kicked off by the puppet authorities on the strength of the "National Security Law (NSL)".
					 They charged that the repressive campaign which had rapidly gained in scope on the strength of the NSL since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime has become more frantic with the "Cheonan" case as a momentum.
					
					 Recently the authorities suppressed the Solidarity for Progress, the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Pusan Headquarters under it, the National Council for the Promotion of the Reunification by Federal Formula, the Headquarters of the Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces and other organizations and even ordinary citizens on charges of the violation of the NSL, they said, adding:
					
					 The authorities labeled the Socialist Workers' Federation "a propaganda and agitation organization tasked to carry out a socialist revolution" and are persecuting the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification which sent letters carrying suspicions about the "results of the investigation" into the "Cheonan" case to the UN Security Council after branding them as "organizations benefiting the north."
					
					 Such repressive campaign of the authorities is aimed at gagging those who are opposed to the policy of the "government" in a bid to achieve their political purpose at any cost with the above-said case as a momentum, they stated, demanding the authorities stop at once the above-said repressive campaign.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region of Russia issued a statement on July 7 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement noted that Kim Il Sung set national reunification as the supreme task of the nation from the first day of Korea's division. He authored many works on national reunification through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and energetic pursuit, thus indicating the way for the Korean nation to follow.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President serve as the three charters for national reunification that should be always held fast to by the Korean nation in its efforts to achieve national reunification, it said, adding: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung embraced and led to the road of reunification and patriotism with broad magnanimity and tolerance whoever embarked upon the path of national reunification irrespective of ideology, ism and political view and religion, not questioning about his or her past.
					
					 The undying exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in the movement for national reunification will remain shining forever.
					
					 The officials and all other compatriots of the confederation will turn out in the struggle to thoroughly implement the instructions of Kim Il Sung for national reunification true to the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Mexico, a seminar, a film show and a photo exhibition in Bangladesh and a lecture in Romania from June 29 to July 4 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the revolutionary history of the President and feats performed by him.
					
					 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised
						 Kim Il Sung as a prominent leader, a great man of the century and a benevolent father of the people who devoted all his life to the victory of the Korean revolution and the world revolution and the accomplishment of the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution in his teens and put an end to the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, building a new society in which the people have become a master on the land of Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean film "Pyongyang at Night."
					
					 A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in Bangladesh.
					
					 Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, issued a statement on July 5 on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the theme of "Possibility of applying the Juche idea, the Songun idea to small and backward countries" took place in Mongolia on July 2.
					 Davaadorj Begz, director of the Institute for Strategic Studies who is chairman of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, delivered an opening address at the seminar. Then a member of the association and the chairman of the Executive Committee of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche made speeches on the themes of "Juche idea in the world and Mongolia" and "On the Songun politics."
					
					 Speakers said that the Juche idea which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and is being developed in depth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il serves not only as a guiding idea of the DPRK but as a banner indicating the road of independent development and prosperity of Mongolia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Noting that the Juche idea serves as a guiding principle for the struggle of all the countries and nations and the peoples of the developing countries, in particular, for protecting independence and sovereignty, happiness and prosperity, they stressed that this was clearly proved in the reality of the DPRK. They explained and proved this fact in detail. 
					
					 The Songun politics being pursued by Kim Jong Il is, indeed, patriotic politics guaranteeing each country's security and independent development, they noted. They praised the DPRK for having firmly protected its dignity with Songun politics despite the imperialists' persistent moves to stifle it and made a contribution to the peace and security in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, to the global peace and security. 
					
					 The chairman of the association in his closing address underscored the need to further intensify the activities for studying and disseminating the Juche idea, the Songun idea in the run-up to the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars and film shows took place in Austria, Italy and Germany from June 29 to July 3 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films denouncing U.S. imperialism, provoker of the Korean War. 
					
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, in his speech made at a meeting accused the U.S. of provoking the Korean War six decades ago and massacring innocent people.
					
					 Aldo Bernardini, chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, at a seminar said that the DPRK has bolstered the reliable war deterrent despite ceaseless challenges of the imperialist allied forces including the U.S.  He stressed that a war has been deterred on the Korean Peninsula, a fruition of the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Constanzi Franco, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, referred to the DPRK's efforts to conclude a peace treaty, urging the U.S. to opt to promptly respond to its proposal for early start of talks to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. 
					
					 Wolfgang Fittinger, chairman of the Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany, at a seminar condemned the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and called for positive activities in support of the Korean people's just cause.
					
					 A solidarity letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Germany.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere a la declaracion del presidente del CS
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere a la declaracion del presidente del CS
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- En entrevista exclusiva concedida con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea con motivo de que fue publicada la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU relativa al caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 10 como sigue:
					 Aunque las autoridades surcoreanas remitieron el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, este organismo finalizo el debate de este tema limitandose a publicar una declaracion del presidente carente del correcto juicio o conclusion sin aprobar ninguna resolucion.
					
					  En particular, el CS tomo en consideracion las reacciones de los paises interesados, incluyendo la RPDC que puso en claro que no tiene nada que ver con el citado caso.
					
					  No habria sido posible otro resultado, ya que ese caso fue planteado y tratado con prisa aun antes de ser esclarecida su verdad.
					
					  Este hecho demostro claramente que equivocados  estuvieron EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea que actuaron descabelladamente para calumniar a nuestro pais con alegatos absurdos.
					
					 Prestamos la atencion a este parrafo de la declaracion del presidente: "se promovera solucionar de manera pacifica los problemas pendientes de la Peninsula Coreana reiniciando el dialogo directo y las negociaciones por vias adecuadas".
					
					 Desde el principio, el caso de la corbeta "Cheonan" debio ser resuelto entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea sin llevarse a la ONU.
					
					  Sigue invariable nuestra posicion de esclarecer hasta el final la verdad del caso.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan conservar in statu quo el lugar de los hechos, incluyendo las condiciones submarinas, hasta cuando acceda a este lugar nuestro grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional.
					
					  El presente suceso, que llevo a punto de explosion la situacion general de la Peninsula Coreana debido a un complot, vuelve a recordar la peligrosidad del actual sistema de armisticio y la urgencia del establecimiento del sistema de paz.
					
					  Mediante las conversaciones a 6 bandas basadas en la igualdad, nos esforzaremos constantemente por firmar el convenio de paz y la desnuclearizacion.
					
					  Si las fuerzas hostiles siguen recurriendo a las provocaciones tales como la demostracion de las fuerzas armadas y la sancion oponiendose a la declaracion del presidente que aboga por "prevenir el conflicto y su ampliacion" en la Peninsula Coreana, ellas no podran evitar nuestra fuerte reaccion fisica ni liberarse de la responsabilidad de la consiguiente ampliacion del conflicto.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Rumania
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Rumania
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Son Gyong fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en Rumania.

articles.title: Se fortalece la cooperacion entre la RPDC y el Fondo de la Poblacion
articles.content:
Se fortalece la cooperacion entre la RPDC y el Fondo de la Poblacion
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- Este ano se acoge el 25o aniversario del comienzo de la cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Fondo de la Poblacion (FP) de la ONU.
					El gobierno de la RPDC firmo en el 74 (1985) de la Era Juche un convenio con el FP y realizo desde entonces diversas actividades para mejorar la labor de la poblacion.
					
					Desde 1986, el FP vino brindando su cooperacion a la RPDC en una serie de trabajos como la formacion del personal calificado, la construccion de la base material, el censo de la poblacion, la mejora de salud de las mujeres, etc.
					
					Con la ayuda del FP, la RPDC realizo el primer censo de la poblacion de todo el pais en 1993 y el segundo en 2008 satisfaciendo las normas cientificas internacionales.
					
					En el ano pasado y el presente, quedo terminada exitosamente la investigacion sobre las causas de muerte de las embarazadas y parturientas y la calidad del servicio sanitario a ellas, la cual constituye una de las metas importantes del desarrollo de nuevo milenio.
					
					El resultado de esta investigacion sirve de dato basico para trazar de modo cientifico el plan de desarrollo de economia nacional y el otro de salud publica.
					
					Con motivo del 11 de julio,  Dia Mundial de la Poblacion, el jefe de seccion del Instituto de Poblacion, Yang Song Il (de 47 anos de edad), dijo a la ATCC que este ano termina el plan de colaboracion del cuarto periodo 2007-2010 del FP sobre Corea y hay que trazar el otro para el quinto periodo 2011-2013.
					
					Anadio que en el futuro tambien, el Instituto de Poblacion realizara la investigacion sobre varios dominios que contribuiran cientificamente al desarrollo de la economia y salud del pais, se esforzara activamente por poner en practica el programa de accion de la conferencia internacional del desarrollo de la poblacion y por alcanzar las metas de desarrollo de nuevo milenio e intensificara la cooperacion con las organizaciones internacionales, inclusive el FP de la ONU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena "principios" defendidos por camarilla surcoreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena "principios" defendidos por camarilla surcoreana
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este sabado un articulo del comentarista condenando la teoria criminal de las autoridades surcoreanas sobre el supuesto "mantenimiento de principios". 
					 Esta teoria publicitada tanto por la banda de Lee Myung Bak deviene un sofisma antinacional sumamente peligroso que niega la epoca del 15 de Junio, da vuelco a las relaciones Norte-Sur y persigue el enfrentamiento y la guerra, precisa el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					  Debido a la quiebra de las relaciones Norte-Sur y al fracaso de la politica interior y exterior, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos fue castigada severamente por el pueblo en las "elecciones de autonomia local". Pero, lejos de expiar su pecado, se muestra desafiante burlandose de la opinion publica
					
					  Ultimamente, la banda de Lee Myung Bak habla tanto del "mantenimiento de principios" para encubrir sus crimenes antinacionales, antidemocraticas y anti-reunificacion y justificar su campana en busca del enfrentamiento fratricida y la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					  Por lo tanto, la teoria en cuestion deviene en su contenido, esencia y objetivo el sofisma extremadamente absurdo que impide la reunificacion abogando por la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					  Lo mas problematico del caso es el "principio" de subordinar las relaciones Norte-Sur a las con EE.UU.
					
					  Esto deviene la abierta negacion a la soberania nacional y la muestra de la muy peligrosa corriente vendepatria y servil a las grandes potencias de los que no tienen ni el elemental criterio y posicion sobre las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					  La banda titere surcoreana se obstina en la "teoria de dar prioridad a las relaciones Sur de Corea-EE.UU. partiendo de su intencion de convertir el Sur de Corea en la colonia eterna de EE.UU. y hacer correr la misma suerte a la RPDC.
					
					  Resulta muy absurdo que las autoridades surcoreanas insistieran en mantener su "principio" de no promover las relaciones intercoreanas antes de que fuera resuelto el problema nuclear del Norte.
					
					 Ellas cuestionan el problema nuclear de la RPDC para eliminar a toda costa el poderoso disuasivo nuclear de ella y recurrir cada vez mas junto con EE.UU. a las maniobras de guerra nuclear contra ella.
					
					  El hecho de que la banda conservadora surcoreana califica de "10 anos perdidos" las relaciones Norte-Sur que avanzaron a pasos firmes despues de aprobada la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio deviene intolerable burla e insulto al deseo de reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					  Ella trata de echar a perder todos los exitos logrados entre ambas partes despues del 15 de Junio de 2000 negando las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y volver las relaciones bilaterales a la epoca de enfrentamiento del pasado.
					
					  No se debe dejar intacta a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que pese a su crimen de haber llevado las relaciones Norte-Sur a la quiebra, insiste en el "mantenimiento de principios" hablando de las "correctas relaciones Sur-Norte en la orbita normal".
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que su criminal teoria en cuestion les llevara a la autodestruccion.
